params._encodedActionArgs: The encoded parameters for the callOnExternalPosition

returns.amountsToTransfer_: The amounts to be transferred from the Vault
returns.assetsToReceive_: The assets to be received at the Vault
returns.assetsToTransfer_: The assets to be transferred from the Vault

returns.initArgs_: Parsed and encoded args for ExternalPositionProxy.init()
